primary_question: 32. (a) The sum of the areas of two squares is 52 cm² and difference of their perimeters is 8 cm. Find the lengths of the sides of the two squares.
secondary_question: (b) The time taken by a person to travel an upward distance of 150 km was $2 \frac{1}{2}$ hours more than the time taken in the downward return journey. If he returned at a speed of 10 km/h more than the speed while going up, find the speeds in each direction.
